name: Distant Dreams (SparkStarGames)
description:
A Yume nikki fangame created for the "Dream diary jam 5"

This game is a demo or prototype of what will be a more complete game, as time goes by it will be updated and will have more content until the game is complete.

#dreamdiaryjam5

Features:

-Surreal dream worlds with strange characters, effects (for now there is only two) and a cool BGM

-Minigames to play in the Sparkstation360 (For now there is only one)

-A computer where you can save games, unlock things and read distant memories

By the way thanks for visiting my game page, many of the things in the game at the beginning I had no idea how to do them (like the pixel art and the minigames) but along the way I was learning, it was tiring but fun, especially for the nice and creative community of Yume Nikki that participated with me in this JAM, I hope you enjoy my game as much as I enjoyed making it. 

You can check the credits inside the game files, they are two text files called "Credits"
